item.description:
PASSIM
SUN DEC 19, 8PM
Wintery Songs in Seven Part Harmony
featuring Rose Polenzani, Aoife O'Donovan, Margaret Glaspy, Catie Curtis, Elana Arian and Jennifer Kimball - some of the most amazing acoustic artists around.

This show will be a real treat - come and enjoy a delicious vegetarian dinner in pleasant company before /during the show and enjoy the seasonal music as we head towards Christmas..

NOTE: Jennifer Kimball used to be part of The Story - a 2 woman band with incredible harmonies. She is super talented as are the other artists.. Check Jennifer's website out at:
item.how_to_find_us: Table at the front on the RHS close to the stage.
item.name: Wintery Songs in 7 part harmony at Passim with Jennifer Kimball and friends
